body_html:
Hi @arassadin, did you set the cuDNN installation path to the tensorrt's lib dir? I.e. what did you set for this prompt:
Please specify the location where cuDNN 7 library is installed. Refer to README.md for more details. [Default is /usr/local/cuda]:
body_text:
Hi @arassadin, did you set the cuDNN installation path to the tensorrt's lib dir? I.e. what did you set for this prompt:
Please specify the location where cuDNN 7 library is installed. Refer to README.md for more details. [Default is /usr/local/cuda]:
body:
Hi @arassadin, did you set the cuDNN installation path to the tensorrt's `lib` dir? I.e. what did you set for this prompt:
`Please specify the location where cuDNN 7 library is installed. Refer to README.md for more details. [Default is /usr/local/cuda]:`
